name: L-isoleucine,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
definition: L-Isoleucine + 2 Oxygen + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> (E)-2-Methylbutanal oxime + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + CO2 + 3 H2O
comment: three-step reaction (see R10027+R10028+R10029) The enzyme can also accept L-valine as substrate, with a lower activity.(1.14.14.38) 3step reaction (similar to R00730+R04460+R07190)
